content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-25.5, 20.0)
Consists of boiler (position -25.5, 20.0), steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5). The boiler is currently not connected to any power network and has no input liquid.

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -49.0) and a furnace (position -18.0, -49.0).

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position not specified) and inserter that puts into the assembling machine (position not specified).
- Beltgroup (position not specified) that connects the furnace to the assembling machine.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when removing electricity groups
- Ensure that the second argument for removing an electricity group is a valid Position object.

### Errors when connecting pipes and boilers
- Verify that there are no placement blockages when attempting to connect pipes between the boiler and offshore pump. Ensure that the positions are clear of other entities.

### Errors when adding fuel to boiler
- Make sure to be within range of the boiler when attempting to insert coal or any other fuel. Check that the boiler is accessible and not blocked by other entities.

### Errors when retrieving entities
- Confirm that the specified position actually contains the entity type you are trying to access. If the entity is not present, adjust the position accordingly.

### General placement errors
- Ensure that the tile you are trying to place an entity on is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place it.
